text: I was sold at the age of seven my slave
master got ownership of me I was held in
a cage where I couldn't move that's
where he had held me so I would submit
to his will I was born in southern India
and I was living with my mother and my
father and my brothers and sisters but
one day I was taken and kidnapped from
my mother and sold into slavery I had so
much physical beatings and different
things that happen to be my body my mind
shut down I became like dysfunctional I
couldn't do anything so they wanted to
get rid of me the traffickers wanted to
make one more profit so they sold me to
International Adoption Canada became my
transit country and then through Canada
I came into the United States so at the
age of 8 I met my adopted mother she was
an amazing woman though she helped
rebuild my life she gave me a new life a
new beginning she really was
my rescuer and then at the age of 16 my
mother got cancer and then she soon died
[Music]
it was until 1999 I wanted to see where
I was from Who am I what's my name
when was I born I didn't know any of
these details because of the traffickers
I had that and changed the information
so in 1999 I traveled back to India for
the first time after 21 years from being
sold into slavery and under
circumstances and events that ultimately
led to my birth mother I wanted to know
why did she give me up for adoption and
she didn't know what the word adoption
was people told her I was dead
today I work as an advocate for victims
I speak for those without a voice and
I'm a former UN special adviser to the
Global Initiative to fight human
trafficking I believe we can change the
systems that enslave children around the
world every day is a new beginning and I
have to choose what am I gonna do today
and I personally chose to stand up -
rise up - rise up and stand up for other
people's freedom
[Music]
